game_description: Are you interested in a narrated story that guides you through coloring your world? Do you want to master your breathing by using our exercises that incorporate the environment? Have you ever felt the need to escape to a sound garden with nothing but yourself and calming sounds? Listen to our stories as they guide you through a narrative which combines painting your environment, looking for clues and uncovering the elements that make up the world. Navigate and teleport through the world to discover the secrets of our stories. Experience our breathing guide to slow the tempo of your life and master the control of your breath. Relax by escaping to our sound gardens - simple rooms with special audio sensory experiences. We hope we have something that helps you relax and find your inner peace.
review_1: This is a lovely app, currently in alpha, so I’m sure there’s lots more to come (hence only 4 stars). There are 3 sections: color therapy (PLEASE be aware it’s not a coloring app), breathing, and sound therapy. If you like relaxation/meditation apps, give this a try. They’re off to a beautiful start with this app, and I’m looking forward to watching it grow.
